ARABIC: لَّا تَجْعَلْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقْعُدَ مَذْمُومًا مَّخْذُولًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not set up any other god together with Allah and so sit there reviled and forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not set up another god with God, or you will remain disgraced and destitute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do not set up any other god with Allah lest you are rendered humiliated and helpless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not consider anything equal to God lest you will become despised and neglected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O listener, do not set up another God with Allah, for you will then remain seated condemned, helpless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Set not up with Allah any other ilah (god), or you will sit down reproved, forsaken (in the Hellfire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do not associate with Allah any other god, lest you sit down despised, neglected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Set not up with God another god, or thou wilt sit condemned and forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Set not up with Allah any other god (O man) lest thou sit down reproved, forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not set up any other deity beside God, lest you incur disgrace, and be forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Set not up along with Allah anot her god, lest thou sit down reproved, renounced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not set up another god besides Allah, or you will sit blameworthy, forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Take not with Allah another object of worship; or thou (O man!) wilt sit in disgrace and destitution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Set not up with Allah any other ilah (god), (O man)! (This verse is addressed to Prophet Muhammad SAW, but its implication is general to all mankind), or you will sit down reproved, forsaken (in the Hell-fire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not set up with Allah another god, or you will sit condemned and forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do not set up another god with God, lest you become condemned and damned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:22] Do not set up another god besides God, or you will sit blameworthy, forsaken, with no one to assist you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Set not up) do not pronounce (with Allah any other god (0 man) lest thou sit down reproved) reproaching yourself, (forsaken) by your Lord.
